name: Hazard Tower
description:
Welcome to Hazard Tower, a challenging platformer game that will probably make you angry!

This game was created for a College Game Jam by a team of 3.

In this game you play as a military soldier who has been given an objective to reach the bottom of a mysterious tower due to some disappearances of people from the local village that have been believed to have gone near the tower.

You will start at floor 100 and go floor to floor completing 25 different difficult platforming challenges to reach the bottom.

Meanwhile as you get further down the tower slowly corrodes and the new traps introduced to stop you get weirder and weirder.

  • Simple but difficult to master Platforming Controls
  • 25 Different difficult challenges to face with more to come!
  • 2 Game-modes, either play Normal Mode and play the levels in order or try your skill at Endless mode and see how long you can last with 1 life!
  • Death Count & Timer so you can challenge yourself or your friends and see who can get the best score!
  • Uhhhh Other Stuff?

Arrow Keys - Move, Jump & Main Menu Movement
Enter - Main Menu Selection
Esc - Pause Menu
E - To go to the next level when you reach the end of a level.

This game was created by a team of 3...

@Mostly_RC - Project Manager & Programmer
Josh GG - Art & Level Designer.
Kai R - Level Creator & Play testing.

Playtesting Help from Seb W & Joe G.

Menu Music - Landing by Godmode
Sound Effects taken from Youtube SFX library.
